resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75184</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75184</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>80b6c9b8-f81d-4907-a287-7e7806ea90bc#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Állítsd össze a képet!</string>
            <string language="en">Put together the picture!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammengefügt der Abbildung!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remonté l'image !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unido o retrato!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unito l'immagine!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάλτε μαζί την εικόνα!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Juntado el cuadro!</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tatárjárás (1241-1242)</string>
            <string language="en">The Mongol invasion of Hungary in 1241-42</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">történelem, Állítsd össze a képet!, interaktív feladat, IV. Béla, Magyar, király</string>
            <string language="en">history, Put together the picture!, interactive exercise, Béla the fourth, Hungarian, king</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die mongolische Invasion von Ungarn 1241-42</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'invasion mongolienne de la Hongrie en 1241-42</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A invasão mongol de Hungria em 1241-42</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'invasione mongol dell'Ungheria in 1241-42</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μογγόλος εισβολή της Ουγγαρίας το 1241-42</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La invasión mongol de Hungría en 1241-42</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte, fügte die Abbildung! zusammen, 
interaktive Übung, Béla die vierte, Ungar, König</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'histoire, a remonté l'image !, exercice 
interactif, Béla le quatrième, Hongrois, roi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o history, uniu o retrato!, exercício interativo,
Béla o quarto, hungarian, rei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la storia, ha unito l'immagine!, esercitazione 
interattiva, Béla il quarto, ungherese, re</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία, συνολικά την εικόνα!, διαλογική άσκηση, 
Bιla ο τέταρτος, ουγγρικά, βασιλιάς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la historia, juntó el cuadro!, ejercicio 
interactivo, Béla el cuarto, húngaro, rey</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75184</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=80b6c9b8-f81d-4907-a287-7e7806ea90bc&v=1&b=3</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
